reviewtext: I was pleasantly surprised that this binocular is well constructed, small, and therefore more likely to accompany me on hikes and outings. Oh, and very affordable as well. Focus is smooth, images bright. It comes with a cheap, but functional vinyl case with belt loop and Velcro closure.  I can recommend these optics. Of course, the reader should consider that this assessment is based on the purchase price compared to features and quality received.
